A snapshot of a workflow execution at a given time.

WorkflowExecutionDTO.WorkflowExecutionStepStatus - Enum in alien4cloud.rest.deployment
The status of a step is related to the status of it's related instances: If one instance is STARTED then the step is STARTED. If all instance are COMPLETED without error then the step is COMPLETED_SUCCESSFULL. If all instance are COMPLETED but one has error, then the step is COMPLETED_WITH_ERROR.
